name: islanger
short_description:
Ever wanted to know what your friend is talking about if you're inexperienced chatter. Now you'll know, this is special program designed to search queries about some slang word who we all use during chats in IRC or on other popular protocols, words like LOL, ll, ss, fu, rtfm. 

Maybe there're million others like this program, what my program offers is:

    simplicity
    compactness
    speed 

Well, it should be that one day :).
summary: Dictionary for internet slang to a plain english conversion.
